name: cupy.absolute = <ufunc 'cupy_absolute'>
description: Elementwise absolute value function.

name: cupy.add = <ufunc 'cupy_add'>
description: Adds two arrays elementwise.

name: cupy.all
description: Tests whether all array elements along a given axis evaluate to True.

name: cupy.allclose
description: Returns True if two arrays are element-wise equal within a tolerance.

name: cupy.amax
description: Returns the maximum of an array or the maximum along an axis.

name: cupy.amin
description: Returns the minimum of an array or the minimum along an axis.

name: cupy.angle = <ufunc 'cupy_angle'>
description: Returns the angle of the complex argument.

name: cupy.any
description: Tests whether any array elements along a given axis evaluate to True.

name: cupy.arange
description: Returns an array with evenly spaced values within a given interval.

name: cupy.arccos = <ufunc 'cupy_arccos'>
description: Elementwise inverse-cosine function (a.k.a. arccosine function).

name: cupy.arccosh = <ufunc 'cupy_arccosh'>
description: Elementwise inverse of hyperbolic cosine function.

name: cupy.arcsin = <ufunc 'cupy_arcsin'>
description: Elementwise inverse-sine function (a.k.a. arcsine function).

name: cupy.arcsinh = <ufunc 'cupy_arcsinh'>
description: Elementwise inverse of hyperbolic sine function.

name: cupy.arctan = <ufunc 'cupy_arctan'>
description: Elementwise inverse-tangent function (a.k.a. arctangent function).

name: cupy.arctan2 = <ufunc 'cupy_arctan2'>
description: Elementwise inverse-tangent of the ratio of two arrays.

name: cupy.arctanh = <ufunc 'cupy_arctanh'>
description: Elementwise inverse of hyperbolic tangent function.

name: cupy.argmax
description: Returns the indices of the maximum along an axis.

name: cupy.argmin
description: Returns the indices of the minimum along an axis.

name: cupy.argpartition
description: Returns the indices that would partially sort an array.

name: cupy.argsort
description: Returns the indices that would sort an array with a stable sorting.

name: cupy.around
description: Rounds to the given number of decimals.

name: cupy.array
description: Creates an array on the current device.
signature: cupy.array(obj, dtype=None, copy=True, order='K', subok=False, ndmin=0)

name: cupy.array_repr
description: Returns the string representation of an array.

name: cupy.array_split
description: Splits an array into multiple sub arrays along a given axis.

name: cupy.array_str
description: Returns the string representation of the content of an array.

name: cupy.asanyarray
description: Converts an object to array.

name: cupy.asarray
description: Converts an object to array.

name: cupy.ascontiguousarray
description: Returns a C-contiguous array.

name: cupy.asfortranarray
description: Return an array laid out in Fortran order in memory.

name: cupy.asnumpy
description: Returns an array on the host memory from an arbitrary source array.

name: cupy.atleast_1d
description: Converts arrays to arrays with dimensions >= 1.

name: cupy.atleast_2d
description: Converts arrays to arrays with dimensions >= 2.

name: cupy.atleast_3d
description: Converts arrays to arrays with dimensions >= 3.

name: cupy.average
description: Returns the weighted average along an axis.

name: cupy.base_repr
description: Return a string representation of a number in the given base system.

name: cupy.binary_repr
description: Return the binary representation of the input number as a string.

name: cupy.bincount
description: Count number of occurrences of each value in array of non-negative ints.

name: cupy.bitwise_and = <ufunc 'cupy_bitwise_and'>
description: Computes the bitwise AND of two arrays elementwise.

name: cupy.bitwise_or = <ufunc 'cupy_bitwise_or'>
description: Computes the bitwise OR of two arrays elementwise.

name: cupy.bitwise_xor = <ufunc 'cupy_bitwise_xor'>
description: Computes the bitwise XOR of two arrays elementwise.

name: cupy.blackman
description: Returns the Blackman window.

name: cupy.broadcast_arrays
description: Broadcasts given arrays.

name: cupy.broadcast_to
description: Broadcast an array to a given shape.

name: cupy.can_cast
description: Returns True if cast between data types can occur according to the casting rule. If from is a scalar or array scalar, also returns True if the scalar value can be cast without overflow or truncation to an integer.

name: cupy.cbrt = <ufunc 'cupy_cbrt'>
description: Elementwise cube root function.

name: cupy.ceil = <ufunc 'cupy_ceil'>
description: Rounds each element of an array to its ceiling integer.

name: cupy.clear_memo
description: Clears the memoized results for all functions decorated by memoize.

name: cupy.clip
description: Clips the values of an array to a given interval.

name: cupy.column_stack
description: Stacks 1-D and 2-D arrays as columns into a 2-D array.

name: cupy.common_type
description: Return a scalar type which is common to the input arrays.

name: cupy.concatenate
description: Joins arrays along an axis.

name: cupy.conj = <ufunc 'cupy_conj'>
description: Returns the complex conjugate, element-wise.

name: cupy.copy
description: Creates a copy of a given array on the current device.

name: cupy.copysign = <ufunc 'cupy_copysign'>
description: Returns the first argument with the sign bit of the second elementwise.

name: cupy.copyto
description: Copies values from one array to another with broadcasting.

name: cupy.corrcoef
description: Returns the Pearson product-moment correlation coefficients of an array.

name: cupy.cos = <ufunc 'cupy_cos'>
description: Elementwise cosine function.

name: cupy.cosh = <ufunc 'cupy_cosh'>
description: Elementwise hyperbolic cosine function.

name: cupy.count_nonzero
description: Counts the number of non-zero values in the array.

name: cupy.cov
description: Returns the covariance matrix of an array.

name: cupy.cross
description: Returns the cross product of two vectors.
signature: cupy.cross(a, b, axisa=-1, axisb=-1, axisc=-1, axis=None)

name: cupy.cumprod
description: Returns the cumulative product of an array along a given axis.

name: cupy.cumsum
description: Returns the cumulative sum of an array along a given axis.

name: cupy.deg2rad = <ufunc 'cupy_deg2rad'>
description: Converts angles from degrees to radians elementwise.

name: cupy.degrees = <ufunc 'cupy_rad2deg'>
description: Converts angles from radians to degrees elementwise.

name: cupy.diag
description: Returns a diagonal or a diagonal array.

name: cupy.diagflat
description: Creates a diagonal array from the flattened input.

name: cupy.diagonal
description: Returns specified diagonals.

name: cupy.diff
description: Calculate the n-th discrete difference along the given axis.

name: cupy.divide = <ufunc 'cupy_true_divide'>
description: Elementwise true division (i.e. division as floating values).

name: cupy.dot
description: Returns a dot product of two arrays.

name: cupy.dsplit
description: Splits an array into multiple sub arrays along the third axis.

name: cupy.dstack
description: Stacks arrays along the third axis.

name: cupy.einsum
description: Evaluates the Einstein summation convention on the operands. Using the Einstein summation convention, many common multi-dimensional array operations can be represented in a simple fashion. This function provides a way to compute such summations.

name: cupy.empty
description: Returns an array without initializing the elements.

name: cupy.empty_like
description: Returns a new array with same shape and dtype of a given array.

name: cupy.equal = <ufunc 'cupy_equal'>
description: Tests elementwise if x1 == x2.

name: cupy.exp = <ufunc 'cupy_exp'>
description: Elementwise exponential function.

name: cupy.exp2 = <ufunc 'cupy_exp2'>
description: Elementwise exponentiation with base 2.

name: cupy.expand_dims
description: Expands given arrays.

name: cupy.expm1 = <ufunc 'cupy_expm1'>
description: Computes exp(x) - 1 elementwise.

name: cupy.eye
description: Returns a 2-D array with ones on the diagonals and zeros elsewhere.

description: Compute the two-dimensional FFT.

description: Compute the N-dimensional FFT.

name: cupy.fft.hfft
description: Compute the FFT of a signal that has Hermitian symmetry.

name: cupy.fft.ifft
description: Compute the one-dimensional inverse FFT.

name: cupy.fft.ifft2
description: Compute the two-dimensional inverse FFT.

name: cupy.fft.ifftn
description: Compute the N-dimensional inverse FFT.

name: cupy.fft.ifftshift
description: The inverse of fftshift().

name: cupy.fft.ihfft
description: Compute the FFT of a signal that has Hermitian symmetry.

name: cupy.fft.irfft
description: Compute the one-dimensional inverse FFT for real input.

name: cupy.fft.irfft2
description: Compute the two-dimensional inverse FFT for real input.

name: cupy.fft.irfftn
description: Compute the N-dimensional inverse FFT for real input.

name: cupy.fft.rfft
description: Compute the one-dimensional FFT for real input.

name: cupy.fft.rfft2
description: Compute the two-dimensional FFT for real input.

name: cupy.fft.rfftfreq
description: Return the FFT sample frequencies for real input.

name: cupy.fft.rfftn
description: Compute the N-dimensional FFT for real input.

name: cupy.fill_diagonal
description: Fills the main diagonal of the given array of any dimensionality.

name: cupy.fix = <ufunc 'cupy_fix'>
description: If given value x is positive, it return floor(x). Else, it return ceil(x).

name: cupy.flatnonzero
description: Return indices that are non-zero in the flattened version of a.

name: cupy.flip
description: Reverse the order of elements in an array along the given axis.

name: cupy.fliplr
description: Flip array in the left/right direction.

name: cupy.flipud
description: Flip array in the up/down direction.

name: cupy.floor = <ufunc 'cupy_floor'>
description: Rounds each element of an array to its floor integer.

name: cupy.floor_divide = <ufunc 'cupy_floor_divide'>
description: Elementwise floor division (i.e. integer quotient).

name: cupy.fmax = <ufunc 'cupy_fmax'>
description: Takes the maximum of two arrays elementwise.

description: Takes the minimum of two arrays elementwise.

name: cupy.fmod = <ufunc 'cupy_fmod'>

name: cupy.frexp = <ufunc 'cupy_frexp'>
description: Decomposes each element to mantissa and two’s exponent.

name: cupy.fromDlpack
description: Zero-copy conversion from a DLPack tensor to a ndarray.

name: cupy.full
description: Returns a new array of given shape and dtype, filled with a given value.

description: Returns a full array with same shape and dtype as a given array.

name: cupy.fuse
description: Decorator that fuses a function.

name: cupy.get_array_module
description: Returns the array module for arguments.

name: cupy.get_default_memory_pool
description: Returns CuPy default memory pool for GPU memory.

name: cupy.get_default_pinned_memory_pool
description: Returns CuPy default memory pool for pinned memory.

name: cupy.greater = <ufunc 'cupy_greater'>
description: Tests elementwise if x1 > x2.

description: Tests elementwise if x1 >= x2.

name: cupy.hamming
description: Returns the Hamming window.

name: cupy.hanning
description: Returns the Hanning window.

name: cupy.histogram
description: Computes the histogram of a set of data.

description: Splits an array into multiple sub arrays horizontally.

description: Stacks arrays horizontally.

description: Computes the hypoteneous of orthogonal vectors of given length.

name: cupy.identity
description: Returns a 2-D identity array.

name: cupy.imag
description: Returns the imaginary part of the elements of the array.

description: Tests whether each element of a 1-D array is also present in a second array.

name: cupy.indices
description: Returns an array representing the indices of a grid.

name: cupy.inner
description: Returns the inner product of two arrays.

name: cupy.isclose
description: Returns a boolean array where two arrays are equal within a tolerance.

description: Returns a bool array, where True if input element is complex.

description: Check for a complex type or an array of complex numbers.

name: cupy.isfinite = <ufunc 'cupy_isfinite'>
description: Tests finiteness elementwise.

name: cupy.isfortran
description: Returns True if the array is Fortran contiguous but not C contiguous.

description: Calculates element in test_elements, broadcasting over element only. Returns a boolean array of the same shape as element that is True where an element of element is in test_elements and False otherwise.

name: cupy.isinf = <ufunc 'cupy_isinf'>
description: Tests if each element is the positive or negative infinity.

description: Tests if each element is a NaN.

name: cupy.isreal
description: Returns a bool array, where True if input element is real.

name: cupy.isrealobj
description: Return True if x is a not complex type or an array of complex numbers.

name: cupy.isscalar
description: Returns True if the type of num is a scalar type.

name: cupy.ix_
description: Construct an open mesh from multiple sequences.

name: cupy.kron
description: Returns the kronecker product of two arrays.

description: Tests elementwise if x1 <= x2.

description: Return matrix rank of array using SVD method

name: cupy.linspace

name: cupy.log = <ufunc 'cupy_log'>
description: Elementwise natural logarithm function.

name: cupy.log10 = <ufunc 'cupy_log10'>
description: Elementwise common logarithm function.

description: Computes log(1 + x) elementwise.

description: Elementwise binary logarithm function.

description: Computes log(exp(x1) + exp(x2)) elementwise.

description: Computes the logical XOR of two arrays.

name: cupy.logspace
description: Returns an array with evenly-spaced values on a log-scale.

description: Returns the matrix product of two arrays and is the implementation of the @ operator introduced in Python 3.5 following PEP465.
signature: cupy.matmul(ndarray a, ndarray b, ndarray out=None) → ndarray

name: cupy.maximum = <ufunc 'cupy_maximum'>
description: Takes the maximum of two arrays elementwise.

name: cupy.mean
description: Returns the arithmetic mean along an axis.

description: Makes a function memoizing the result for each argument and device.

description: Return coordinate matrices from coordinate vectors.

description: Takes the minimum of two arrays elementwise.

description: Moves axes of an array to new positions.

description: Returns a copy of an array sorted along the first axis.

description: Multiplies two arrays elementwise.

name: cupy.nan_to_num = <ufunc 'cupy_nan_to_num'>
description: Elementwise nan_to_num function.

name: cupy.nanargmax
description: Return the indices of the maximum values in the specified axis ignoring NaNs. For all-NaN slice -1 is returned. Subclass cannot be passed yet, subok=True still unsupported

name: cupy.nanargmin
description: Return the indices of the minimum values in the specified axis ignoring NaNs. For all-NaN slice -1 is returned. Subclass cannot be passed yet, subok=True still unsupported

name: cupy.nanmax
description: Returns the maximum of an array along an axis ignoring NaN.

name: cupy.nanmean
description: Returns the arithmetic mean along an axis ignoring NaN values.

name: cupy.nanmin
description: Returns the minimum of an array along an axis ignoring NaN.

name: cupy.nanprod
description: Returns the product of an array along given axes treating Not a Numbers (NaNs) as zero.

name: cupy.nanstd
description: Returns the standard deviation along an axis ignoring NaN values.

name: cupy.nansum
description: Returns the sum of an array along given axes treating Not a Numbers (NaNs) as zero.

name: cupy.nanvar
description: Returns the variance along an axis ignoring NaN values.
signature: cupy.nanvar(a, axis=None, dtype=None, out=None, ddof=0, keepdims=False)

description: Takes numerical negative elementwise.

description: Rotate an array by 90 degrees in the plane specified by axes.

name: cupy.save
description: Saves an array to a binary file in .npy format.

name: cupy.savez
description: Saves one or more arrays into a file in uncompressed .npz format.

name: cupy.savez_compressed
description: Saves one or more arrays into a file in compressed .npz format.

name: cupy.sign = <ufunc 'cupy_sign'>
description: Elementwise sign function.

name: cupy.signbit = <ufunc 'cupy_signbit'>
description: Tests elementwise if the sign bit is set (i.e. less than zero).

name: cupy.sin = <ufunc 'cupy_sin'>
description: Elementwise sine function.

name: cupy.sinc = <ufunc 'cupy_sinc'>
description: Elementwise sinc function.

name: cupy.sinh = <ufunc 'cupy_sinh'>
description: Elementwise hyperbolic sine function.

name: cupy.sort
description: Returns a sorted copy of an array with a stable sorting algorithm.

name: cupy.split
description: Splits an array into multiple sub arrays along a given axis.

name: cupy.sqrt = <ufunc 'cupy_sqrt'>
description: Elementwise square root function.

name: cupy.square = <ufunc 'cupy_square'>
description: Elementwise square function.

name: cupy.squeeze
description: Removes size-one axes from the shape of an array.

name: cupy.stack
description: Stacks arrays along a new axis.

name: cupy.std
description: Returns the standard deviation along an axis.
signature: cupy.std(a, axis=None, dtype=None, out=None, ddof=0, keepdims=False)

name: cupy.subtract = <ufunc 'cupy_subtract'>
description: Subtracts arguments elementwise.

name: cupy.sum
description: Returns the sum of an array along given axes.

name: cupy.swapaxes
description: Swaps the two axes.

name: cupy.take
description: Takes elements of an array at specified indices along an axis.

name: cupy.take_along_axis
description: Take values from the input array by matching 1d index and data slices.

name: cupy.tan = <ufunc 'cupy_tan'>
description: Elementwise tangent function.

name: cupy.tanh = <ufunc 'cupy_tanh'>
description: Elementwise hyperbolic tangent function.

name: cupy.tensordot
description: Returns the tensor dot product of two arrays along specified axes.

name: cupy.tile
description: Construct an array by repeating A the number of times given by reps.

name: cupy.trace
description: Returns the sum along the diagonals of an array.
signature: cupy.trace(a, offset=0, axis1=0, axis2=1, dtype=None, out=None)

name: cupy.transpose
description: Permutes the dimensions of an array.

name: cupy.tri
description: Creates an array with ones at and below the given diagonal.

name: cupy.tril
description: Returns a lower triangle of an array.

name: cupy.triu
description: Returns an upper triangle of an array.

name: cupy.true_divide = <ufunc 'cupy_true_divide'>
description: Elementwise true division (i.e. division as floating values).

name: cupy.trunc = <ufunc 'cupy_trunc'>
description: Rounds each element of an array towards zero.

name: cupy.unique
description: Find the unique elements of an array.

name: cupy.unpackbits
description: Unpacks elements of a uint8 array into a binary-valued output array.

name: cupy.unravel_index
description: Converts array of flat indices into a tuple of coordinate arrays.

name: cupy.unwrap
description: Unwrap by changing deltas between values to 2*pi complement.

name: cupy.var
description: Returns the variance along an axis.
signature: cupy.var(a, axis=None, dtype=None, out=None, ddof=0, keepdims=False)

name: cupy.vdot
description: Returns the dot product of two vectors.

name: cupy.vsplit
description: Splits an array into multiple sub arrays along the first axis.

name: cupy.vstack
description: Stacks arrays vertically.

name: cupy.where
description: Return elements, either from x or y, depending on condition.

name: cupy.zeros
description: Returns a new array of given shape and dtype, filled with zeros.

name: cupy.zeros_like
description: Returns an array of zeros with same shape and dtype as a given array.

name: cupyx.rsqrt = <ufunc 'cupy_rsqrt'>
description: Returns the reciprocal square root.

name: cupyx.scatter_add
description: Adds given values to specified elements of an array.

name: cupyx.scatter_max
description: Stores a maximum value of elements specified by indices to an array.

name: cupyx.scatter_min
description: Stores a minimum value of elements specified by indices to an array.
